properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 5:45AM MST by NWS Goodland KS
properties.description:
At 5:30 AM MST, dense fog was beginning to develop near Goodland
in central Sherman county. Dense fog may develop eastward to
Colby and Oakley through 7 AM MST.

Additionally, decreasing cloud cover and falling temperatures
will freeze lingering moisture on area roads, particularly in
vicinity of Interstate 70 where isolated showers wet the pavement
earlier this morning.

Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution,
particularly at intersections and highway onramps and offramps
where accidents are more likely to occur, and on elevated roadways
such as bridges and overpasses where ice is more likely. Use low
beam headlights and be prepared for rapid reductions in
visibility, especially near rivers, creeks and other low lying
areas.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG AND BLACK ICE POSSIBLE ALONG INTERSTATE 70 THIS MORNING
